```
create table CALCULATION (
   ID      int not null auto_increment,
   A       varchar(100),
   B       varchar(100),
   RESULT  varchar(100),
   primary key (ID)
);
```

```
alter table CALCULATION
add SUM varchar(100);
```

```
update CALCULATION
set CALCULATION.sum = CALCULATION.result
where CALCULATION.sum is null;
```

```
alter table CALCULATION
drop column RESULT;
```
